Html: Hey guys, having issues with my enchants and optimizer.  When I update enchants on specific slots, then run an optimizer, it will revert to the old enchants in those slots.  Is there something I'm doing wrong here?  I'm not sure its a bug.
You probably haven't marked the enchants available; check the enchant charts.
And thats probably because I don't know where to do that.  Mind helping me jog my memory?
The whole right half of the main form is for charts. At the top, you choose what chart to view. View the charts for enchants, and mark them available.
